long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can add some color themes and background to ManageBac to make it looks better.

Also added checkbox so you can better manage your task.
All settings can be found in Your Profile -> Personalisation.
